description: Crisp, golden, and roasted with herbs and sticky maple syrup, try this delicious and impressive pumpkin twist on classic hasselback potatoes.
name: Roasted Maple Hasselback Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rocket, feta, reserved oil and cranberries in a bowl. Serve pumpkin with rocket salad.
